text: Zavershiv vashi blagochestivyye dela i obryady khadzhzha, ostav'te obychai yazychestva - khvastat'sya svoimi ottsami i predkami - i vozdayte khvalu Allakhu, i vspominayte Yego, kak vspominayete vashikh ottsov, no yeshcho s bol'shey siloy. On vash Blagodetel' i Blagodetel' vashikh ottsov, i mesta khadzhzha - eto mesta molitv i pros'b o blage i miloserdii u Allakha. Sredi palomnikov yest' takiye, kotoryye prosyat u Allakha o milostyakh v blizhayshey zhizni i ne dumayut o budushchey zhizni. Etim net doli v budushchey zhizni
